title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 197.7 - Possession of certificates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 197.7 - Possession of certificates

State Regulations
A certificate holder shall keep the certificate of
registration in his immediate possession, and shall display the certificate
upon the request of the commissioner or his duly authorized
representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
197.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
